Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I just started messing around with Kopernicus to create a clone of Minmus. I duplicated files from the Kopernicus folder, placed Minmus II in orbit around Kerbin, then landed.
But I noticed a visual inconsistency: the mountains seem exceedingly steep in the map view, and the map shows the ship below ground. Finally the newly added ocean is not visible in map view.

Being new to Kopernicus and modding (but not to softare development), I cannot tell what went wrong.

 

Can anyone guide me on the way to solving this ? Thanks in advance !

 

The video is here.
Pic below: mountains on the horizon that are way bigger than in foreground.

 

Finally, here are two pics and the contents of my GameData/Minmus2 folder: https://imgur.com/a/AG6gjsC
I would ask about this in the Kopernicus thread as seems a very specific issue to do with Kopernicus; they’ll know how to fix I’m sure
Will do. In the mean time I removed Rescale (was using 2.0x) which fixed the issue. I will try and solve that later, but for now, I have an atmosphere and an ocean on Minmus II !
